GaugeText.GaugeString: %((A:GENERAL ENG FUEL USED SINCE START:1, gallons) (A:Fuel weight per gallon, pounds) * 0.0004536 * )%!5d!
%((A:GENERAL ENG FUEL USED SINCE START:2, gallons) (A:Fuel weight per gallon, pounds) * 0.0004536 * )%!5d!
%((A:PRESSURIZATION CABIN ALTITUDE RATE, feet per minute))%!6d!

Expression.Script: (A:PRESSURIZATION CABIN ALTITUDE RATE, feet per minute)

GaugeText.FontColor: %((A:APU PCT RPM, percent) abs 102 > if{ 'red' } els{ 'white' )

GaugeText.GaugeString: %((A:GENERAL ENG FUEL USED SINCE START:1, gallons))%!5d!
%((A:GENERAL ENG FUEL USED SINCE START:2, gallons))%!5d!

%( (A:FUEL TANK LEFT AUX QUANTITY, gallons) (A:FUEL LEFT QUANTITY, gallons) + (A:FUEL TANK CENTER QUANTITY, gallons) + (A:FUEL RIGHT QUANTITY, gallons) + (A:FUEL TANK RIGHT AUX QUANTITY, gallons) + (A:FUEL WEIGHT PER GALLON, pounds) *)%!5d!
%((A:FUEL TANK LEFT AUX QUANTITY, gallons) (A:FUEL WEIGHT PER GALLON, pounds) *)%!5d!
%((A:FUEL LEFT QUANTITY, gallons) (A:FUEL WEIGHT PER GALLON, pounds) *)%!5d!
%((A:FUEL TANK CENTER QUANTITY, gallons) (A:FUEL WEIGHT PER GALLON, pounds) *)%!5d!
%((A:FUEL RIGHT QUANTITY, gallons) (A:FUEL WEIGHT PER GALLON, pounds) *)%!5d!
%((A:FUEL TANK RIGHT AUX QUANTITY, gallons) (A:FUEL WEIGHT PER GALLON, pounds) *)%!5d!

GaugeText.FontColor: %((A:TURB ENG1 N1, percent) abs 100.1 > if{ 'red' } els{ 'white' )
%((A:TURB ENG1 N2, percent) abs 100.1 > if{ 'red' } els{ 'white' )
%((A:GENERAL ENG1 EXHAUST GAS TEMPERATURE, celsius) abs 1000 > if{ 'red' } els{ 'white' )
%((A:GENERAL ENG2 EXHAUST GAS TEMPERATURE, celsius) abs 1000 > if{ 'red' } els{ 'white' )

GaugeText.GaugeString: %((A:TURB ENG1 FUEL FLOW PPH, PPH) abs)%!5.1f!
%((A:TURB ENG2 FUEL FLOW PPH, PPH) abs)%!5.1f!
%((A:TURB ENG1 FUEL FLOW PPH, PPH) (A:TURB ENG2 FUEL FLOW PPH, PPH) + abs)%!5.1f!
%((A:FUEL LEFT QUANTITY, gallons) (A:FUEL TANK CENTER QUANTITY, gallons) + (A:FUEL RIGHT QUANTITY, gallons) + (A:FUEL WEIGHT PER GALLON, pounds) *)%!5d!
